name: Hrothgar - Demo
description:
!!! Do not select inventory in combat. Game crashes, looking into it right away!!!
Update: Yikes, this is pretty nasty bug, event system I put together is now biting me pretty good :<

Here's a demo of a playable-ish state of a game I've been working on for a lot longer than I want to admit :)

I will add screenshots and whatnot at a later date if there's any level of interest.

Credits:

Art, music, code, & custom tools - Me

NOTE: Sorry, I pushed up an old build initially. If you downloaded the 0.1 Please download 0.2. There were some bug fixes that were initially supposed to be in the demo. That build was unpredictable. Sorry for any convenience. If you haven't downloaded it yet, then you saw nothing O_O

Thank you
